import React,{useState}from'react';function CartItem(_ref){let{item,onRemoveFromCart,inCart}=_ref;const[itemQuantity,setItemQuantity]=useState(1);const addQuantity=()=>{setItemQuantity(itemQuantity=>itemQuantity+1);};const reduceQuantity=()=>{if(itemQuantity>1){setItemQuantity(itemQuantity=>itemQuantity-1);}};function handleRemoveFromCart(){if(inCart){onRemoveFromCart(item);}};// Modify
